Name: Vira
Text: Oh Vira look at yourself, a college graduate all set to get into the world, independent.

Name: Vira
Text: Now that I think about it, it sends shivers down my spine.

Name: Vira
Text: Urrghh. Well one thing is for sure I have to cook my own meal.

Name: Vira
Text: God!. (silence) Definitely better than canteen food.

Name: Vira
Text: I have to stop beating around the bush. It is the first day of work tomorrow.

Name: Vira
Text: Will I be able to do everything properly?

Name: Vira
Text: What if I am not able to speak?

Name: Vira
Text: I should not keep worrying for no reason!

Name: Vira
Text: Calm down Vira. Take a deep breath!
